#summary DBus API for dogvibes native server
== Description ==

The dogvibes server API
  * Running on the SYSTEM bus
  * Service com.DogVibes.www (to be changed)
  * Object /com/dogvibes/www (Maybe more objects to come maybe not)
  * Interface com.DogVibes.www (to be changed)
  * Examples are in dbus-send syntax

== Methods for interface com.Dogvibes.www ==

=== Play ===

For now it only plays a track in spotify.

Play string:username string:password string:spotifyuri

==== Examples ====
 
  * dbus-send --system --print-reply --dest=com.DogVibes.www /com/dogvibes/www com.DogVibes.www.Play string:username string:password string:spotifyuri

==== Returns ====

Nothing

----

=== Stop ===

Stops the currently playing track if any.

==== Examples ====

  * dbus-send --system --print-reply --dest=com.DogVibes.www /com/dogvibes/www com.DogVibes.www.Stop

==== Returns ====

Nothing

----

=== Search ===

Performs a search in the music database. Currently only support for searching Spotify.

==== Examples ====

  * dbus-send --system --print-reply --dest=com.DogVibes.www /com/dogvibes/www com.DogVibes.www.Search string:username string:password string:searchstring

==== Returns ====

An array formed like this

`["artist,title,key"], ["artist,title,key"], ...]`
